page.title: 09MARSH HOUSE
page.content: Marsh House is a{play centre}for children aged 5-16.It has an{adventure {playground}that the Leader built by himself,and it did not cost one penny. The house has a cafe in it.The Play Centre is{under threat}because of new Council regulations;the Council won't pay,so the Leader is doing some{fund {raising}himself.We asked the Leader some questions and found out that he worked here "because I like being outside and with children".The average age of the children is between{10-12 yrs and most attend between{4-6 pm}on school days.They come becuase there's not much to do at home and they want to run about.A lot of the children come from{blocks of flats}at Marsh Farm,Hockwell and Limbury.The children mix quite well and there most popular item in the playground is the Maze. Groups can hire the playground.
